entities.name: sardine
entities.description: Mentioned as an example of a food that Ron wouldn't touch, which turned out to be pepper.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, who is hesitant to try new foods and has a pet rat named Scabbers.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Ron's pet rat, which is still snoozing on his lap.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A round-faced boy who has lost a toad and is searching for it.

entities.name: toad
entities.description: A pet that Harry has lost, which keeps getting away from him.

relationships.description: Ron owns Scabbers, his pet rat.
Harry has lost the toad, which keeps getting away from him.
